title: Steam $10 gift card for OCE $10 RP or CSGO key steam for $20 RP (2x$10 RP cards)
body:
Hello, fellow summoners. So I was recently gifted two things, one being a CSGO game key (I already own CSGO) and a $10 steam card (I didn't want to buy any new games) So now I'm left with two things that I don't require but do 100% work. I am looking for someone who is willing to trade a $10 rp card for a steam gift card or $20 card for a CSGO game key!
ONLY PEOPLE FROM OCEANIC
If your interested just type below I am interested with your in game name!
